title: How to Backup and Restore League of Legends
body:
I just download the game which was a total of 7 GB , and in the future if it gets corrupted or if i want to format my entire HDD i want to backup everything , now i can backup dota 2 easily but dont know how to back up LOL can u guys help me pls
Thank You A lot

replies.body:
Heya
Just copy the League of Legend folder onto a external hard drive or so.
However keep in mind that this backup would still need to get patches applied once you restore it, so either deal with that or regularly renew your backup.

Regards Rkoturdo

What in particular do you want to back up with the client?  I ask because account related details, such as bindings and runes, are all saved on our side.  If there were a time you needed to re-install league, all of that information will still be present for you.  Let me know if that helps clear things up!
